snippet: The groom tried and failed to convince the WNYC producer he was serious about their relationship, so he emailed former Wyoming senator Alan Simpson for help.
abstract: Vows column on wedding of Anna Sale and Arthur Middleton.

byline.contributor: Ruffin Prevost contributed reporting from Cody, Wyo.

lead_paragraph: The groom tried and failed to convince the WNYC producer he was serious about their relationship, so he emailed former Wyoming senator Alan Simpson for help.

headline.print_headline: Regretting a Breakup, He Calls In a Political Favor
headline.main: Anna Sale and Arthur Middleton: A Political Favor Wins Her Back
